item.description:
* Free Ron Paul "End the Fed" NY Times Best Seller as well as Gary Johnson 2012 yard signs (limited quantity) for attendees while they last! *

Facebook event page: http://www.facebook.com/events/538286306196972

On the agenda: NDAA Nullification updates, future projects discussion, internal business & more..

Please come out and contribute your thoughts and ideas into the mix. Our meetup members come from various social, religious and political backgrounds; everyone is invited to participate as long as you respect personal liberty.

Â
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be at the tables to the right in the back.
item.name: CT for Liberty Organizational Meetup
